chunk:
Bedrock Balm

Brand: Bedrock

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Grapeseed Oil, Zinc Oxide, Sunflower wax, Lavender Flower Oil, Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Rosehip Seed Oil, Organic Jojoba Seed Oil, Shea Oil, Organic Calendula Flower, Organic Olive Fruit Oil, Allantoin, Vitamin E, Sunflower Seed Oil, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Roman Chamomile Fl

, Roman Chamomile Flower Oil, German Chamomile Flower Oil, Baking Soda.

Directions: Apply to clean skin and massage into the area. Apply morning and night for best possible results.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
